sentences.en: A booster does of tetanus toxoid and penicillin should be administered.
sentences.cn: 给予破伤风类毒素加强剂与青霉素.

sentences.en: a dance organized by the school’s booster club
sentences.cn: 由学校球迷俱乐部举办的一场舞会

sentences.en: Advanced Aeronautics booster color changes for Apollo and Carrier Drones.
sentences.cn: 先进航空学将会改变阿波罗和舰载机的加速器颜色.

sentences.en: Frank was carrying out fuel-system tests which necessitated turning the booster pumps off.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克在做燃料系统测试，这一测试需要关掉升压泵。

sentences.en: Ground controllers will then fire the booster, sending the satellite into its proper orbit.
sentences.cn: 然后地面控制人员将会发射推进器，把卫星送入正常轨道。

sentences.en: His advice gave you a great morale booster and upper.
sentences.cn: (他的劝告,带给你高昂的士气和鼓舞. )

sentences.en: Pneumatic pipe without the use of booster pump lubricant.
sentences.cn: 气动管道增压泵无需使用润滑剂.

sentences.en: Praise is a great confidence booster.
sentences.cn: 赞扬是一种很好的信心增强剂。

sentences.en: The booster was Saturn C - 3 and the key technique was lunar orbit rendezvous.
sentences.cn: 采用萨杜恩C -3 运载火箭,关键技术是月球轨道会合.

sentences.en: The danger lay in the possibility of the booster's breaking up before the pilots could react.
sentences.cn: 危险在于宇航员可能还来不及作出反应火箭就破裂了.

sentences.en: The delta - winged Columbia, before reaching the orbit, jettisoned its dual booster rockets two minutes into flight.
sentences.cn: 三角翼的哥伦比亚号航天飞机在进入轨道前, 起飞两分钟就抛下其两个助推火箭.

sentences.en: The Sidewinders were convinced as a morale booster.
sentences.cn: 响尾蛇导弹不过是用来充当鼓舞士气的工具罢了.

sentences.en: There are prospects for reducing solid booster costs to make them financially more competitive.
sentences.cn: 从长远的观点看,就降低成本来说,固体助推器更具有竞争能力.

sentences.en: This battery booster is a boon for photographers.
sentences.cn: 这种电池充电器是摄影工作者的好帮手。

sentences.en: This medicine will last for a time, but after six months you'll need a booster.
sentences.cn: 这种药的效力可维持一段时期, 但6个月后就需要使用增强药效的辅助剂.

sentences.en: This win has been a great morale booster.
sentences.cn: 这次获胜是一次巨大的精神鼓舞。

phrases.tran_cn: 辅助鼓风机，增压鼓风机
升压泵，增压泵；接力泵，前置泵
真空助力器；真空加浓器

trans.tran_cn: （电器的）增压机，助推器，多级火箭的第一级，热情的支持者
trans.tran_en: someone who gives a lot of support to a person, organization, or idea
